description: This file defines the MemorySummarizer class, which uses a language model to generate session summaries from message pairs. It includes methods for updating the model, generating system messages, and processing responses to produce structured summaries.

classes.name: MemorySummarizer
classes.description: A class that summarizes conversation messages into a structured session summary using a language model.

methods.name: update_model
methods.description: Initializes or updates the language model used for summarization, attempting to import OpenAIChat if not already set.

methods.name: get_system_message
methods.description: Constructs a system message instructing the model to analyze conversation messages and extract a summary and topics.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Synchronously processes message pairs to generate a session summary, handling response parsing and validation.

methods.name: arun
methods.description: Asynchronously processes message pairs to generate a session summary, similar to run but using async methods.
